English: I can speak Finnish fairly well.
I can use spoken Finnish fluently.
Hungarian: Jól tudok finn beszélt nyelvet használni

English: Writing is still challenging for me.
Hungarian: Az írás még mindig kihívás számomra

English: I'm better at speaking than at writing.

Finnish: Minä ymmärrän, mutta en puhu paljon.
English: I understand, but I don't speak a lot.
I want to learn to speak Finnish.
